FacilityStr1: 1 MI. N. OF ENGLEWOOD & 3/10 MI. E

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
COOPERATIVE ELEVATOR AND SUPPLY COMPANY OF MEADE, KANSAS (ENGLEWOOD BRANCH) IS AN AGRICULTURAL RETAIL BUSINESS WHICH SPECIALIZES IN AGRICULTURAL INPUTS SUCH AS FERTILIZERS, AG CHEMICALS AND ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.
                                                                                                                                                                                    OUR PLANT CONSISTS OF ONE (1) 18,000 GALLON TANK WITH APPROXIMATELY 79,000 POUNDS OF PRODUCT WHEN FILLED TO 85%.  DURING THE BUSY SEASON THERE ARE APPROXIMATELY 10 NURSE TANKS, MAXIMUM, AT THIS LOCATION.   THE FACILITY IS INSPECTED EACH YEAR BY THE KANSAS DEPT OF AGRICULTURE AND WE COMPLY WITH ALL THEIR REQUESTS FOR IMPROVEMENTS.  THE PLANT STRICTLY ADHERES TO ALL FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL REGULATIONS.                                                                  

OUR EMPLOYEES ARE TRAINED ON AN ANNUAL BASIS IN THE EMERGENCY PROCEDURES, OPERATIONAL PROCEDURES, MAINTENANCE ACTIVITIES AND THE HAZARDS OF ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.  WITH THIS KNOWLEDGE, IT IS EASY TO REPORT THAT NO ACCIDENTS OR PROPERTY DAMAGE HAVE OCCURRED  AT THIS  SITE WITHIN THE LAST FIVE YEARS.                                                   

WE HAVE COORDINATED OUR EMERGENCY PROCEDURES WITH THE LOCAL FIRE DEPARTMENT, THE COUNTY LEPC AND THE CLARK COUNTY FIRE DEPARTMENT.  THEY ARE AWARE OF THE DANGERS OF NH3 AND HAVE BEEN GIVEN A TOUR OF OUR FACILITY, AND ARE WELCOME TO SCHEDULE TOURS OR TRAINING AT OUR FACILITY, WHEN THEY DEEM IT NECESSARY.  THEY HAVE AGREED TO BE OUR FIRST RESPONDERS IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY.
